titleSection.name: VersionOne Integration for CruiseControl
titleSection.shortDescription: link agile workitems to tangible, working software in the form of builds

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne CruiseControl publisher creates a record of CruiseControl builds in VersionOne, so the development teams can quickly view builds associated with a story or defects. This visibility is useful when identifying what build to use for verification or when generating release notes.

updates.releaseNotes:
* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy. 
 * Added: Support for CruiseControl 2.8.4

mediaSection.title: Build Integration
mediaSection.caption: Integrate your build system to make it clear which workitems are contained in which builds.
